00045 #ifndef __NLAO_IO_H__
00046 #define __NLAO_IO_H__
00047 
00048 #include <_ansi.h>
00049 
00050 _BEGIN_STD_C
00051 
00052 typedef char u8;
00053 typedef unsigned int u32;
00054 
00055 #define __raw_writeb(v,a)       (*(volatile unsigned char  *)(a) = (v))
00056 #define __raw_writew(v,a)       (*(volatile unsigned short *)(a) = (v))
00057 #define __raw_writel(v,a)       (*(volatile unsigned int   *)(a) = (v))
00058 
00059 #define __raw_readb(a)          (*(volatile unsigned char  *)(a))
00060 #define __raw_readw(a)          (*(volatile unsigned short *)(a))
00061 #define __raw_readl(a)          (*(volatile unsigned int   *)(a))
00062 
00063 /* As long as I/O is only performed in P4 (or possibly P3), we're safe */
00064 #define writeb(v,a)             __raw_writeb(v,a)
00065 #define writew(v,a)             __raw_writew(v,a)
00066 #define writel(v,a)             __raw_writel(v,a)
00067 
00068 #define readb(a)                __raw_readb(a)
00069 #define readw(a)                __raw_readw(a)
00070 #define readl(a)                __raw_readl(a)
00071 
00072 /* Memory segments when segmentation is enabled */
00073 #define P0SEG           0x00000000
00074 #define P1SEG           0x80000000
00075 #define P2SEG           0xa0000000
00076 #define P3SEG           0xc0000000
00077 #define P4SEG           0xe0000000
00078 
00079 /* Returns the privileged segment base of a given address */
00080 #define PXSEG(a)        (((unsigned long)(a)) & 0xe0000000)
00081 
00082 /* Returns the physical address of a PnSEG (n=1,2) address */
00083 #define PHYSADDR(a)     (((unsigned long)(a)) & 0x1fffffff)
00084 
00085 /*
00086  * Map an address to a certain privileged segment
00087  */
00088 #define P1SEGADDR(a) ((__typeof__(a))(((unsigned long)(a) & 0x1fffffff) | P1SEG))
00089 #define P2SEGADDR(a) ((__typeof__(a))(((unsigned long)(a) & 0x1fffffff) | P2SEG))
00090 #define P3SEGADDR(a) ((__typeof__(a))(((unsigned long)(a) & 0x1fffffff) | P3SEG))
00091 #define P4SEGADDR(a) ((__typeof__(a))(((unsigned long)(a) & 0x1fffffff) | P4SEG))
00092 
00093 
00094 #define cached(addr) P1SEGADDR(addr)
00095 #define uncached(addr) P2SEGADDR(addr)
00096 #define physaddr(addr) PHYSADDR(addr)
00097 
00098 #define BF(field, value) \
00099   ({ union { \
00100       struct { \
00101        unsigned           : 32 - field ##  _OFFSET -  field ##  _SIZE ; \
00102        unsigned long __val: field ##  _SIZE ; \
00103       }; \
00104       unsigned long __ul; \
00105      } __tmp; \
00106      __tmp.__ul = 0; \
00107      __tmp.__val = value; \
00108      __tmp.__ul;})
00109 
00110 #define BF_D(field, value) \
00111   ({ union { \
00112       struct { \
00113        unsigned long long : 64 - field ##  _OFFSET -  field ##  _SIZE ; \
00114        unsigned long long __val: field ##  _SIZE ; \
00115       }; \
00116       unsigned long long __ul; \
00117      } __tmp; \
00118      __tmp.__ul = 0; \
00119      __tmp.__val = value; \
00120      __tmp.__ul;})
00121 
00122 #define BFINS(var, field, value) \
00123   { union {\
00124       struct { \
00125        unsigned           : 32 - field ##  _OFFSET -  field ##  _SIZE ; \
00126        unsigned long __val: field ##  _SIZE ; \
00127       }; \
00128       unsigned long __ul; \
00129      } __tmp; \
00130      __tmp.__ul = var; \
00131      __tmp.__val = value; \
00132      var = __tmp.__ul;}
00133 
00134 #define BFEXT(var, field) \
00135   ({ union {\
00136       struct { \
00137        unsigned           : 32 - field ##  _OFFSET -  field ##  _SIZE ; \
00138        unsigned long __val: field ##  _SIZE ; \
00139       }; \
00140       unsigned long __ul; \
00141      } __tmp; \
00142      __tmp.__ul = var; \
00143      __tmp.__val; })
00144 
00145 #define BFINS_D(var, field, value) \
00146   { union {\
00147       struct { \
00148        unsigned long long : 64 - field ##  _OFFSET -  field ##  _SIZE ; \
00149        unsigned long long __val: field ##  _SIZE ; \
00150       }; \
00151       unsigned long long __ul; \
00152      } __tmp; \
00153      __tmp.__ul = var; \
00154      __tmp.__val = value; \
00155      var = __tmp.__ul;}
00156 
00157 #define BFEXT_D(var, field) \
00158   ({ union {\
00159       struct { \
00160        unsigned long long : 64 - field ##  _OFFSET -  field ##  _SIZE ; \
00161        unsigned long long __val: field ##  _SIZE ; \
00162       }; \
00163       unsigned long long __ul; \
00164      } __tmp; \
00165      __tmp.__ul = var; \
00166      __tmp.__val; })
00167 
00168 
00169 _END_STD_C
00170 
00171 #endif
